metaInfo.property:
Monochromatic-code light syntax highlighting color scheme by Aquaticat.
Only 5 colors were used:
#ffffff pure white #c0c0c0 light gray #808080 gray #404040 dark gray #000000 black
Only seeing these five colors while coding have reduced my eye strain. I hope it would help with other people's eye problems, too.
Website of the color scheme: https://code.monochromatic.dev/ (inaccessible as of 2023FEB17)
Repo of the color scheme: https://github.com/Aquaticat/monochromatic-code/ (no readme as of 2023FEB17)
